text: Adrien Couret (born 10 November 1983) is the former CEO of HEC Alumni.Son « coup de foudre pour la Macif » a eu raison de ses envies de prof : Adrien Couret se confie He graduated from HEC Paris in 2007.Macif: Adrien Couret, le «golden boy» de l’assurance mutualiste He is also Director of Aéma Groupe, a French insurance company.Adrien Couret, entre Macif, Aéma et HEC Alumni, un parcours sans faute == Bibliography == * Adrien Couret, Claude Alphandéry, Tous sociétaires !, March 2022, ISBN 9782080282583 == References == Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of HEC Paris Category:French businesspeople Category:People from Val-de-Marne
title: Adrien Couret
